detailsData.title: Experienced Employment Lawyers
detailsData.content: We have dedicated our practice to protecting employees for more than two decades. Our knowledgeable attorneys will work hard to make sure that your rights are asserted in a dispute with your employer.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Legal Protection
detailsData.content: In the workplace, you are protected by federal, state, and local laws. Our employment attorneys assist California workers with matters related to discrimination, harassment, wrongful termination, wage and hour law, retaliation, class actions, and defamation.

detailsData.title: Successful Case Results
detailsData.content: We have achieved significant settlements for our clients, including multi-million dollar class action lawsuits. Our track record demonstrates our commitment to achieving justice for employees.

detailsData.title: Client-Focused Approach
detailsData.content: We are passionate about representing workers in California who need a voice in the legal process. Our attorneys keep clients informed and involved in every aspect of their case.

address: 8822 W Olympic Blvd, Beverly Hills, CA 90211
valueProp: When you go to work, you hope that your employer will treat you fairly and in accordance with the law. Unfortunately, too many employers have little concern with their employees' well-being. They may ignore sexual harassment or ask workers to work off the clock, skirting wage and hour laws. At The Nourmand Law Firm, we can put our experience to work for you. We have dedicated our practice to protecting employees for more than two decades. We understand that the challenges that you face may feel insurmountable, but our knowledgeable attorneys will work hard to make sure that your rights are asserted in a dispute with your employer.
CTA: Contact Us Now For a Free Consultation
